analysis.key_quote: Unlawfully removing these rights in order to play politics with our civil service system would pave the way for a new era of cronyism and mismanagement, which will not end well.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of due process rights and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
